short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create videos in seconds using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VideoGen makes it easy to generate videos with captions, b-roll footage, music, and AI narration. 

Using the VideoGen Chrome Extension, you can select any text on the Internet and convert it into a video in just a few clicks.
